title: Can Crowdsourcing Tell Us Whether A Burrito Is Any Good FiveThirtyEight » Features | FiveThirtyEight

type_specific.selection: This past summer, FiveThirtyEight took on the somewhat ridiculous task of searching for America’s Best Burrito. Knowing this effort would be Herculean, we enlisted the help of Yelp and a panel of food experts to guide us. Nate Silver created a statistic — value over replacement burrito, or VORB — to rate and rank each […]
